isis.stitle: TSI 96-12-01 - Revision to the Special Torque Value for the Main Bearing Mounting Bolt for DT 408, DT 466, DT 466E, International® 530 and International® 530E Diesel Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Revision to the Special Torque Value for the Main Bearing Mounting Bolt for DT 408, DT 466, DT 466E, International® 530 and International® 530E Diesel Engines

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The engine main bearing mounting bolt torque is changed to 176 Nm (130 lbf-ft) from 157 Nm (115 lbf-ft) for the subject engines above Serial Number 850000.
A copy of this service letter should be filed with the engine service manual (Form No. EGES-105 or EGES-160) until the manual has been updated to include this change.
